title: Dantevos85
author: Dantevos85
content: 2066ac05110d63d85c0df347e3627f1fe8535cd9d4d74f5b913a9785e81fc5b7Is the transactiID.. can someone please push it thru? The site I bought from only did 5sat fee Thanks so much

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: The best is to wait and let the mempool to become less congested, not that congested though because if 10 sat/vbyte is used, the transaction would have been confirmed. The mempool is at 6 sat/vbyte now when I rechecked, try and be patient, the transaction would be confirmed.

comments.author: Dantevos85
comments.body: Thanks I'm not sure why the guy only did 5sat .. when I try to bump fee mycelium  says bumping not necessary. . How long would u estimate a miner picks this one up ? Its only 377$ in bitcoin ..small amount

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: Dantevos85 on June 28, 2022, 10:40:51 PMThanks I'm not sure why the guy only did 5sat .. when I try to bump fee mycelium  says bumping not necessary. . How long would u estimate a miner picks this one up ? Its only 377$ in bitcoin ..small amount You receive the error "bumping not necessary" which means your transaction is already confirmed. You can check them directly on any block explorer or this link below- https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/transaction/2066ac05110d63d85c0df347e3627f1fe8535cd9d4d74f5b913a9785e81fc5b7You paid 5 sat fee which is enough to confirm your transaction in a few minutes and according to that transaction it was made 9 minutes ago.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: In the future, you could directly use a transaction accellerator such as ViaBTC, because the accounts of miners are rarely online on this forum - and by the time they do get online, your transaction would have long been confirmed.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on June 29, 2022, 05:44:02 AMIn the future, you could directly use a transaction accellerator such as ViaBTCPaid accelerator charges too excessively and not advisable, but if you meant ViaBTC free accelerator, Dantevos85 should know that only transaction with feerate of 10 sat/byte and above can be accelerated, any amount in fee lower than that can not.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on June 29, 2022, 06:32:20 AMPaid accelerator charges too excessively and not advisable, but if you meant ViaBTC free accelerator, Dantevos85 should know that only transaction with feerate of 10 sat/byte and above can be accelerated, any amount in fee lower than that can not.It is not only a question of fee rate, but also perfect timing, considering that it can be successfully done only every full hour, and from my personal experience, even choosing a browser can play a role. Even if the transaction is successfully added, sometimes it is necessary to wait for several hours for Via to find the block, so all this should be taken into account.
